src:
Grčka odustala od kandidature: Srbija sad ima veće šanse
Vlada Grčke nije dala zeleno svetlo

06 Nov 2019

Košarkaški savez Grčke je odustao od kandidature za organizaciju kvalifikacionog turnira za plasman na Olimpijske igre u Tokiju.
Savez je dostavio aplikaciju za domaćinstvo, ali Vlada Grčke nije depozit kako bi kandidatura bila validna, potvrdio je predsednik KS Grčke Jorgos Vasilakopulos.„Sve smo uradili oko kandidature osim finansijskih uslova. Pre tri meseca smo kontaktirali Vladu, ali nismo dobili odgovor. Oni se prave gluvi. Čekali smo mesec i po dana bez odgovora“. rekao je Vasilakopulos.
Kandidature su za sada potvrdili Srbija i Hrvatska, a očekuje se da uskoro isto učini i Litvanija. Prema najavama, FIBA će dva od četiri kvalifikaciona turnira za Tokio, dodeliti evropskim federacijama.
text:
Greece drops candidacy: Serbia now stands a better chance
The Greek government has not given the green light

06 Nov 2019

The Greek Basketball Federation has withdrawn its bid to host a qualifying tournament for the Tokyo Olympics.
The Alliance has submitted a household application, but the Greek government is not a deposit in order for the candidacy to be valid, confirmed Greek President George Vassilakopoulos. Three months ago, we contacted the Government but received no response. They make themselves deaf. We waited a month and a half without answering. " said Vasilakopoulos.
Nominations have been confirmed by Serbia and Croatia for the time being, and Lithuania is expected to do the same soon. According to the announcement, FIBA will award two of the four qualifying tournaments for Tokyo, to European Federations.
